Blink.name: Blink
Blink.description: * Is an UI feedback utility. It creates a visual highlight changing background color from yellow to white.*

Calendar.name: Calendar
Calendar.description: * Is a UI Widget for show dates.*

Carousel.name: Carousel
Carousel.description: * Carousel is a large list of elements. Some elements will be shown in a preset area, and others will be hidden waiting for the user interaction to show it.*

Controls.name: Controls
Controls.description: * Abstract class that brings the functionality of all form controls.*

Support.name: Support
Support.description: * Returns a data object with features supported by the device*

Extend.name: Extend
Extend.description: * Extend is a utility that resolve creating interfaces problem for all UI-Objects.*

Countdown.name: Countdown
Countdown.description: * Counts the amount of characters that user can enter in a form control and limit the length of value of input.*

Custom.name: Custom
Custom.description: * Create custom validation interfaces for Validator validation engine.*

DatePicker.name: DatePicker
DatePicker.description: * Is a UI Widget for picking dates.*

Dropdown.name: Dropdown
Dropdown.description: * A navegable list of items, UI-Object.*

Eraser.name: Eraser
Eraser.description: * Eraser is an utility to erase component's instances and free unused memory. A Numer will erase only that particular instance, a component's name will erase all components of that type, a "meltdown" will erase all component's instances from any kind.*

Floats.name: Floats
Floats.description: * Abstract class of all floats UI-Objects.*

Form.name: Form
Form.description: * Forms is a Controller of DOM's HTMLFormElement.*

Keyboard.name: Keyboard
Keyboard.description: * Keyboard event controller utility to know wich keys are begin*

List.name: List
List.description: * Manage collections with abstract lists. Create a list of objects, add, get and remove.*

Modal.name: Modal
Modal.description: * Is a centered floated window with a dark gray dimmer background. This component let you handle its size, positioning and content.*

Min.name: Min
Min.description: * Validate a number with a minimun value.*

Max.name: Max
Max.description: * Validate a number with a maximun value.*

Price.name: Price
Price.description: * Validate a number with a price format.*

Object.name: Object
Object.description: * Object represent the abstract class of all Objects.*

onImagesLoads.name: onImagesLoads
onImagesLoads.description: * Execute callback when images of a query selection loads*

Positioner.name: Positioner
Positioner.description: * Positioner is an utility that centralizes and manages changes related to positioned elements, and returns an utility that resolves positioning for all UI-Objects.*

Preload.name: Preload
Preload.description: * Pre-load is an utility to preload images on browser's memory. An array of sources will iterate and preload each one, a single source will do the same thing.*

MinLength.name: MinLength
MinLength.description: * Validate a minimun amount of characters.*

MaxLength.name: MaxLength
MaxLength.description: * Validate a maximun amount of characters.*

TabNavigator.name: TabNavigator
TabNavigator.description: * TabNavigator UI-Component for static and dinamic content.*

Tab.name: Tab
Tab.description: * Simple unit of content for TabNavigators.*

Tooltip.name: Tooltip
Tooltip.description: * Simple Tooltip UI-Object. It uses the 'alt' and 'title' attributes to grab its content.*

Uiobject.name: Uiobject
Uiobject.description: * Object represent the abstract class of all UI Objects.*

Validation.name: Validation
Validation.description: * Validation is a validation engine for html forms elements.*

Validator.name: Validator
Validator.description: * Validator is a validation engine for html forms elements.*

Viewport.name: Viewport
Viewport.description: * Viewport is a reference to position and size of the visible area of browser.*

Zoom.name: Zoom
Zoom.description: * Zoom shows a contextual reference to an augmented version of main declared image.*
